alert.note: Alert for Anderson; Central Greenville; Greater Oconee; Greater Pickens; Southern Greenville (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 01 at 8:30AM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Greenville, northeastern Anderson, central Pickens and east central Oconee Counties through 900 AM EDT... At 830 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles north of Seneca, moving east at 80 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Easley, Clemson, Seneca, Walhalla, Pickens, Greenville Downtown, West Greenville, Berea, Welcome and Powdersville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Anderson; Central Greenville; Greater Oconee; Greater Pickens; Southern Greenville
